turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a cinnamon almond milk macchiato from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 864 Folly Road in Charleston, South Carolina.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i'll send your order to that location, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a grande cinnamon macchiato with almond milk to be picked up at the starbucks on folly road. your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you. No, that's all.
